thread.title: Great service!
thread.title_full: Great service! - Review of Staybridge Suites Times Square - New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MercedesV59
title: Great service!
text: Visited family here and enjoyed the complimentary buffet during cocktail hour. The meatballs and salad were great but our server Melinda was a bubbly friendly face who made us feel so welcome. In the crowded busy room, she brought extra drinks and was gracious and warm. Thanks Melinda for NY hospitality!
